entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
